full_summary:
===========================

**Janitorial Services for Block 1, National Capital Region (NCR)**
================================================================

**Notice Number:** WS4053411429

**Publication Date:** September 1, 2023

**Closing Date:** October 12, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)

**Request for Proposal:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bid proposals for Janitorial Services for Block 1, in the National Capital Region (NCR). The selected bidder will be required to provide all necessary labour, materials, and equipment to maintain a clean and safe environment for the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

**Location:**
================================================================================

The services will be required for the following locations:

* Block 1, 80 Wellington St, Ottawa, Ontario
* Block 1, 85 Sparks St, Ottawa, Ontario
* Block 1, 59 Sparks St, Ottawa, Ontario
* Block 1, 61/63 Sparks St, Ottawa, Ontario
* Block 1, 75 Sparks St, Ottawa, Ontario
* Block 1, 65 Sparks St, Ottawa, Ontario
* Block 1, 67 Sparks St, Ottawa, Ontario
* Block 1, 69 Sparks St, Ottawa, Ontario
* Block 1, 93 Sparks St/14 Metcalfe St, Ottawa, Ontario
* Block 1, 90 Wellington St, Ottawa, Ontario

**Site Visit:**

A site visit has been scheduled for September 19th, 2023, at 10:30 AM. All bidders are required to confirm their attendance and provide the names and date of birth of the individuals attending by 2:00 PM EST on September 12, 2023.

**Bid Submission:**

All bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery by October 12, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to bidders who are in compliance with trade agreements, including the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and other agreements listed in the trade agreements section.

**Contact Information:**

For further information, please contact Shauna Barrett at shauna.barrett@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
